properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 8:59AM PST until February 12 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep, 10 to 13
ft. For the Small Craft Advisory, steep seas 7 to 11 ft.

* WHERE...Warning level seas will impact areas south of Gold Beach
beyond 10 NM from shore. Small Craft Advisory conditions will
affect all other areas.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY
